headline: Live Nation Entertainment Announces Pricing Of Convertible Senior Notes Offering
summary: Live Nation Entertainment, Inc. (NYSE: LYV) (the "company") today announced that it priced its previously announced offering of $1.0 billion in aggregate principal amount of its 2.875% convertible senior notes due 2030 (the "Convertible Notes"). The Convertible Notes were priced at 100.000% of their principal amount. The company intends to use the net proceeds from the Convertible Notes offering (i) to finance the repurchase of a portion of its 2.00% convertible senior notes due 2025 (the "exist
